name: Chorizo Breakfast Burritos
author: BARB75
summary: A yummy breakfast burrito using chorizo sausage, great for when you're craving greasy breakfast food (i.e. - when you're hung-over)!
ingredients: ¾ pound chorizo sausage, casings removed and crumbled
1  green chile pepper, seeded and diced
directions: Generously coat a large frying pan with cooking spray
Cook and stir chorizo over medium high heat until well browned and crumbled
Add onion and chile pepper, and continue cooking until onion is tender
Beat eggs in a bowl, and add to chorizo mixture
Reduce heat to medium-low, and continue cooking and stirring until eggs are scrambled and no longer runny
Warm flour tortillas in the microwave for 30 seconds
Spoon mixture into the middle of each tortilla and top with shredded Cheddar cheese
